appDescription.message: 一键清理特定网站的缓存、Cookie等浏览数据，提升浏览体验

sensitiveWarning.message: ⚠️ 注意：清除选中的数据可能会导致登录状态丢失，需要重新登录网站

sensitiveDataWarningTitle.message: 警告：您选择了以下敏感数据：

sensitiveDataWarningConsequences.message: 清除这些数据可能会导致：

pageWillRefresh.message: 页面将会自动刷新，确定要继续吗？

landing_subtitle.message: A powerful browser extension that helps you quickly clean website cache, analyze page performance, and provides comprehensive data management solutions.

landing_feature_smart_clean_desc.message: Supports both smart and custom cleaning modes, precisely cleans the current website's cache data without clearing the entire browser cache.

landing_feature_quick_refresh_desc.message: Automatically refreshes the page after cleaning, providing immediate access to the latest content and accelerating page loading speed.

landing_feature_performance_desc.message: Comprehensively analyzes page performance metrics, resource distribution, and optimization suggestions with visualized key performance data.

landing_feature_custom_rules_desc.message: Create and manage website cleaning rules, with support for importing and exporting settings to meet personalized needs.

landing_feature_ui_desc.message: New sidebar navigation design provides a clearer and more intuitive user experience and operation flow.

landing_feature_i18n_desc.message: Supports Chinese and English internationalization to adapt to different user language preferences.

landing_step_install_desc.message: Install the ClearPage extension from your browser's app store.

landing_step_click_desc.message: Click the ClearPage icon on any website you want to clean cache for.

landing_step_select_desc.message: Choose data cleaning, performance testing, or settings options from the sidebar.

landing_step_apply_desc.message: Clean data, analyze performance, or configure settings as needed.

landing_donate_desc.message: If you find this extension helpful, please consider supporting me to continue developing more useful features!

landing_donate_thanks.message: Your support will help us provide better tools and services

landing_supporter_desc.message: Thank you to all supporters for your generous contributions. Your support motivates me to keep improving the product!

landing_supporter_invitation.message: Your name could also appear here ↑

landing_reviews_desc.message: Experiences and reviews from real users

landing_review_1.message: Very useful, solved my two-day frustration. Perfect for developers and people who like things clean.
